articles.title: Amazon sends legal threats to Perplexity over agentic browsing
articles.description: Amazon won't allow agents on its site that don't identify themselves as such. Perplexity is not pleased.
articles.author: Julie Bort, Rebecca Bellan

articles.title: People Inc. forges AI licensing deal with Microsoft as Google traffic drops
articles.description: People Inc. signs an AI licensing deal with Microsoft, which will use its media content in Copilot.
articles.author: Sarah Perez

articles.title: Beta Technologies ends first day on NYSE in the green and $1B raised
articles.description: Beta Technologies' public market debut is a capstone to founder and CEO Kyle Clark's untraditional approach to building an aviation company.
articles.author: Kirsten Korosec

articles.title: Rivian creates another spinoff company called Mind Robotics
articles.description: It's the second time this year Rivian has spun out a new company, after it created micromobility startup Also in March.
articles.author: Sean O'Kane

articles.title: Google’s AI Mode gets new agentic capabilities to help book event tickets and beauty appointments
articles.description: For example, you can ask "find me 2 cheap tickets for the Shaboozey concert coming up. prefer standing floor tickets." AI Mode will then search
articles.author: Aisha Malik

articles.title: Sequoia names Alfred Lin and Pat Grady as new co-stewards as Roelof Botha steps down
articles.description: Just over three years after taking the reins as the steward of the storied firm, Botha passed the leadership baton to Lin and Grady.
articles.author: Marina Temkin

articles.title: Sora is now available on Android in the US, Canada, and other regions
articles.description: The Android version of Sora retains all the features of its iOS counterpart, including the “Cameos” feature, which allows users to generate videos of
articles.author: Lauren Forristal

articles.title: Norway’s wealth fund vote is latest blow to Musk’s $1 trillion pay package
articles.description: Elon Musk is pushing for a $1 trillion performance pay package. Another major shareholder has said no.
articles.author: Kirsten Korosec

articles.title: Shopify says AI traffic is up 7x since January, AI-driven orders are up 11x
articles.description: Shopify is bullish on AI-powered shopping agents, citing AI as an "incredible tool" to enable more entrepreneurs and calling it the "biggest shift in
articles.author: Sarah Perez

articles.title: Netflix in talks to license video podcasts from iHeartMedia, report says
articles.description: Netflix is looking for exclusivity, which means that video podcasts that it licenses could no longer be uploaded to YouTube.
articles.author: Aisha Malik

articles.title: Phone location data of top EU officials for sale, report finds
articles.description: Journalists in Europe found it was "easy" to spy on top European Union officials using commercially obtained location data sold by data brokers,
articles.author: Zack Whittaker

articles.title: Anthropic projects $70B in revenue by 2028: Report
articles.description: The Information reports that Anthropic expects to generate as much as $70 billion in revenue and $17 billion in cash flow in 2028. The growth
articles.author: Rebecca Bellan

articles.title: Tesla’s Master Plan 4 still lacks specifics ahead of $1T Musk pay vote
articles.description: Despite its imprecision, the fourth "Master Plan" is a centerpiece of Tesla's case for giving CEO Elon Musk $1 trillion in company shares.
articles.author: Sean O'Kane

articles.title: Spotify now has half a million video podcasts, which nearly 400M users have watched
articles.description: Spotify says that users' time spent with video content on Spotify has more than doubled year-over-year, largely driven by video podcasts.
articles.author: Sarah Perez

articles.title: WhatsApp launches long-awaited Apple Watch app
articles.description: For the first time, WhatsApp users will be able to use their Apple Watch to get call notifications, read full messages, record and send voice
articles.author: Aisha Malik

articles.title: Nvidia, Deutsche Telekom strike €1B partnership for a data center in Munich
articles.description: Nvidia has signed a €1 billion partnership with Deutsche Telekom to set up an "AI factory" in Munich that aims to boost Germany's AI computing power
articles.author: Ram Iyer

articles.title: ClickUp adds new AI assistant to better compete with Slack and Notion
articles.description: ClickUp has been trying to better compete with the likes of Notion, Slack, and Microsoft Teams by providing calendar, communication, documents,
articles.author: Ivan Mehta

articles.title: Wait, people actually use Facebook Dating?
articles.description: Meta said that Facebook Dating has 1.77 million daily active users in the US between ages 18-29.
articles.author: Amanda Silberling

articles.title: a16z pauses its famed TxO Fund for underserved founders, lays off staff
articles.description: Andreessen Horowitz is pausing its Talent x Opportunity (TxO) fund and program, according to multiple sources.
articles.author: Dominic-Madori Davis
